lead_paragraph: A man accused of fatally shooting retired NFL player Will Smith and wounding the athlete's wife this month in New Orleans pleaded not guilty on Thursday after a grand jury indicted him on second-degree murder, attempted murder and other charges.

headline.print_headline: Man Pleads Not Guilty in Killing of Former NFL Player in New Orleans
headline.main: Man Pleads Not Guilty in Killing of Former NFL Player in New Orleans
